name: Cubia
description:
Cubia is a relaxing 3D puzzle platformer set on a magical world where the ground shifts as you move. Lead Rolland, a kind-hearted cuboid on his journey to save his homeland.



With the unique ground rotation mechanic, Rolland can rearrange the world just by walking.
  • Solve increasingly difficult hand-crafted puzzles with the help of your trusty steed Rocky.
  • Meet other cuboids and discover the secret behind the recent catastrophe that changed Cubia forever.
  • Collect valuable “Jems” that are now scattered all over Cubia.
  • Avoid dangerous beings that now roam freely around the world.

Story Mode


In the story mode complete 50+ intriguing puzzle levels by thinking about rotations in three dimensions. Puzzles include:
  • Lasers
  • Prisms
  • Unlockable gates
  • Welders
  • Obstacles
  • Dangerous enemies
  • And much more...

Rolland will roam Cubia trying to unlock the mystery that haunts the planet. As the environment changes to harsher climates, the puzzles get more dangerous to solve. As you progress through the lands you will meet different people to guide you on your way as you uncover the true secrets of Cubia.

Level Designer




Cubia comes with a fully-fledged in-game level designer. With its easy to use user interface, you can create intricate levels in no time and share them with your friends.

You can also use the theme selector and select one of the many unique themes to stylize your level.
